title: Unrestrained
description: Drake is everything Kate wants in a man â€• strong, passionate, gorgeous, dominant. Drake fell in love with Kate before he even met her and his passion for her only grew stronger after they met and began an intense relationship where he helped her explore her desire for D/s. Newly engaged, they start their new life together in Nairobi, Kenya, where Drake is teaching and working as a surgeon to help out an old friend. Before they can even get settled in their hew home, they are faced with challenges to their view of themselves and their relationship. Will their love survive?  By Amazon bestselling author S. E. Lund, Unrestrained is the much-anticipated conclusion to the bestselling trilogy in which the intense and passionate relationship between Drake and Kate unfolds as they search for their happy ever after.
author: S.E. Lund
